tool_description: Compares your content strategy against competitors and audience needs to identify content gaps, untapped topics, and opportunities for differentiation.

own_content_inventory.description: List of your existing content topics and themes

target_audience_interests.description: Target audience interests and pain points

industry_topics.description: Comprehensive list of relevant industry topics

content_types_focus.description: Content types to focus gap analysis on

error_messages: Insufficient content data: Provide at least 5 pieces of own content and 1 competitor analysis.
Missing audience data: Include at least 3 target audience interests or pain points.
Insufficient industry topics: Provide at least 10 relevant industry topics for comparison.
Invalid priority level: Choose from high, medium, or low.
Unsupported content type: Use recognized content types for focus analysis.
usage: Provide own_content_inventory, competitor_content_data, target_audience_interests, and industry_topics. Optionally specify content_types_focus and priority_level. Returns identified content gaps and opportunities.

content_gaps.description: Identified gaps in current content strategy

opportunity_topics.description: High-potential topics not covered by competitors

audience_unmet_needs.description: Audience needs not addressed by current content

differentiation_opportunities.description: Ways to differentiate from competitor content
